page.description: Removes fields from a table. Field_list is a crlf list of fields to be removed.

argument.name: tablename
argument.description: The name of the table that is losing fields.

argument.name: field_list
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of field(s).

page.discussion: The TABLE.DELETE_FIELDS() method deletes fields from an existing table. Field_List is a CR-LF delimited string containing the names of fields to be deleted. All of the existing data in Table_Name is preserved when the fields are deleted (except, or course for the data in the fields being deleted).

section.title: Example
section.description: This script deletes several the Lastname field from the Customer Information table.
